title: Latest News from Dalton Maag (September 2008)
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 30.Sep.2008 3.24pm 

£10 off each weight of our new font family, Effra, till the end of Oktober: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/discount/EFFRAOCT](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/discount/EFFRAOCT "http://www.daltonmaag.com/discount/EFFRAOCT")

Bis Ende ist auf Effra ein Discount von £10 pro Schriftschnitt erhältlich: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/discount/EFFRAOCT](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/discount/EFFRAOCT "http://www.daltonmaag.com/discount/EFFRAOCT")

1) Named after a river in South London

Swiss typographer Jonas Schudel began development of this new font family during a type design workshop many years ago. Finally, we are ready to release Effra in five weights...

More: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S1](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S1 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S1")

1) Ein Fluss in Südlondon als Namenspatron: Effra

Der Schweizer Typograf Jonas Schudel hatte vor einigen Jahren während eines Design-Workshops mit dieser Schrift begonnen. Jetzt ist die Effra in fünf Schnitten verfügbar geworden...

Mehr: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S1](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S1 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S1")

2) East meets West

Designing our first Arabic font was a challange to say the least. But we enjoyed every second of it, particularly as we also designed a Latin with a strong family resemblance...

More: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S2](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S2 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S2")

2) East meets West

Der Auftrag, eine Arabische Schrift zu designen, war gelinde ausgedrückt eine Herausforderung. Aber wir genossen jede Sekunde davon, parallel eine Lateinische und arabische Schrift zu einer ausdrucksstarken Schriftfamilie zu entwickeln...

Mehr: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S2](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135705/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S2 "http://www.daltonmaag.com/news/95.html#S2")

3) Font property

Contemporary and commanding, distinctive and traditional, smart and sophisticated: these are just a few attributes that needed to be expressed in this display font for Knight Frank...

3) Knight Frank

Modern und dominant, markant und traditionell, smart und anspruchsvoll: das sind ein paar Attribute des Displayfonts für Knight Frank...
